alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 21 at 2:05PM MDT until October 23 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT SUNDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches below 7000 feet, except 8 to 14 inches above 7000 feet and across ridge tops and passes. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Idaho Central Mountains above 7000 feet, Galena Summit, and Stanley Basin. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times, especially over mountain passes where blowing snow is possible. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS...Backcountry enthusiasts and hunters should be prepared for wintry conditions and the potential for hypothermia if caught in a storm unprepared.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
